mapper.select: SELECT MNGR_DV_CD,DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID,DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID, BRCH_OG_ID FROM ( SELECT (CASE T1.OG_TP_CD WHEN 'W02' THEN '1' /* 매니저 */ WHEN 'W03' THEN '2' /* 홈마스터 */ WHEN 'W06' THEN '2' /* 엔지니어 */ WHEN 'HR1' THEN '3' /* 임직원 */ ELSE '' END) AS MNGR_DV_CD ,(SELECT T2.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T2 WHERE T2.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T2.OG_ID = T1.OG_ID ) AS DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID /* 총괄단 ST163_ADMIN_CD */ ,(SELECT T2.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T2 WHERE T2.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T2.OG_ID = T1.OG_ID ) AS DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID /* 센터 ST163_BIZ_CD */ ,T1.OG_ID AS BRCH_OG_ID /* 지점 ST163_BRNH_CD */ ,(CASE T1.OG_TP_CD WHEN 'W06' THEN '1' WHEN 'W03' THEN '2' WHEN 'W02' THEN '3' WHEN 'HR1' THEN '4' /* w06 > w03 > w02 > hr1 */ ELSE '5' END) AS RNK FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') AND T1.BZ_STAT_CD = '1' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} ORDER BY rnk ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY - NVL(#{useQty},0) AS A_QTY , PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY - NVL(#{useQty},0) AS B_QTY , PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY - NVL(#{useQty},0) AS E_QTY , PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY - NVL(#{useQty},0) AS R_QTY FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND WARE_NO = #{wkWareNo} AND ITM_PD_CD = #{pdCd}

SELECT T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO , T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , T2.WK_CAN_MO_CN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T2 ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3460' AND T2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('00', '10') AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT AS_LCT_CD , AS_PHN_CD , AS_CAUS_CD , SITE_AW_ATC_CD FROM TB_SVPD_AS_TP_CD WHERE 1=1 AND PD_CD = #{pdCd} AND SV_ANA_HCLSF_CD = '3460' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ ( CNTR_NO /* VS107_CSMR_YR ,VS107_CSMR_CD */ , CNTR_SN /* CNTR_SN */ , WK_SN /* WK_SN */ , SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD /* SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD */ , SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD /* VS107_WRK_TYP_DTL */ , VST_DUEDT /* VS107_VST_DT */ , FILT_CHNG_LV_CD /* VS107_CHNG_STG */ , IST_NMN_N /* VS107_INST_MTHS */ , VST_NMN_N /* VS107_VST_MTHS */ , ITM_KND_CD /* VS107_ITEM_KND */ , PART_PD_CD /* VS107_PART_CD */ , PART_USE_QTY /* VS107_QTY */ , VST_DV_CD /* VS107_VST_GB */ , FST_RGST_DTM /* VS107_REG_DT*/ , FST_RGST_USR_ID /* VS107_REG_ID*/ , FST_RGST_PRG_ID /* VS107_PGRM_ID */ , FST_RGST_DEPT_ID , FNL_MDFC_DTM , FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , FNL_MDFC_PRG_ID , FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID ) VALUES ( #{cntrNo} /* VS107_CSMR_YR ,VS107_CSMR_CD */ , #{cntrSn} /* CNTR_SN */ , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(TEMP.WK_SN) + 1, 1) AS WK_SN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ TEMP WHERE TEMP.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND TEMP.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND TEMP.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD = '22' AND TEMP.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2250' ) /* WK_SN */ , '22' /* SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD */ , '2250' /* VS107_WRK_TYP_DTL */ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+7, 'YYYYMMDD') /* VS107_VST_DT */ , '00' /* VS107_CHNG_STG */ , (CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+7, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) /* VS107_INST_MTHS */ , 0 /* VS107_VST_MTHS */ , '' /* VS107_ITEM_KND */ , '' /* VS107_PART_CD */ , 0 /* VS107_QTY */ , '10' /* VS107_VST_GB */ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* VS107_REG_DT */ , '4250' /* VS107_REG_ID */ , 'SP_MK_WELCOME_BS' /* VS107_PGRM_ID */ , #{session.departmentId} /* FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID */ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* VS107_REG_DT */ , '4250' /* VS107_REG_ID */ , 'SP_MK_WELCOME_BS' /* VS107_PGRM_ID */ , #{session.departmentId} /* FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID */ )
